mapper.select: select * from member where user_id = #{user_id} and password = #{password}
select * from enterprise where (etp_addr = #{address_total} and etp_cd like '%'||'h'||'%')

select DISTINCT p.etp_cd,i.etp_if_time1,i.etp_if_time2,e.etp_addr,e.etp_nm from(select s.pd_cd from stock s where to_date(substr(s.st_cd,-5), 'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in}, 'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out}, 'MM-DD') Minus select pd_cd from stock where st_this_num = 0 and to_date(substr(st_cd,-5), 'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in}, 'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out}, 'MM-DD')) a, stock s, product p , enterprise e , enterprise_info i where a.pd_cd = s.pd_cd and to_date(substr(st_cd,-5), 'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in}, 'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out}, 'MM-DD') and e.etp_cd = p.etp_cd and s.pd_cd = p.pd_cd and p.etp_cd = i.etp_cd and e.etp_addr like '%'||#{address}||'%'

select DISTINCT p.etp_cd,i.etp_if_time1,i.etp_if_time2,e.etp_addr,e.etp_nm from(select s.pd_cd from stock s where to_date(substr(s.st_cd,-5), 'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in}, 'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out}, 'MM-DD') Minus select pd_cd from stock where st_this_num = 0 and to_date(substr(st_cd,-5), 'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in}, 'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out}, 'MM-DD')) a, stock s, product p , enterprise e , enterprise_info i where a.pd_cd = s.pd_cd and to_date(substr(st_cd,-5), 'MM-DD') between to_date(#{in}, 'MM-DD') and to_date(#{out}, 'MM-DD') and e.etp_cd = p.etp_cd and s.pd_cd = p.pd_cd and p.etp_cd = i.etp_cd and e.etp_nm like '%'||#{serch}||'%'
select * from enterprise a, enterprise_info b, member c where a.etp_cd = b.etp_cd and c.user_id = a.user_id and b.etp_cd = #{test}
select * from Product where etp_cd = #{code} and pd_nm = #{name}
mapper.insert: insert into orders(or_cd, user_id, pd_cd, or_dt, or_dt2, th_dt, or_stat, or_check, or_price) values(ORDER_SEQ.nextval,#{user},#{pdcode},to_timestamp(#{first}),to_timestamp(#{last}),to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'),'1','1',#{price})
mapper.update: update stock set st_this_num = st_this_num-1 where pd_cd=#{pcode} and (to_date(substr(st_cd, -5),'MM-DD') between to_date(substr(#{in},-4),'MM-DD') and to_date(substr(#{out},-4),'MM-DD'))
